news.title: Africa records highest stablecoin conversion spreads, data shows
news.titleOriginal: Africa records highest stablecoin conversion spreads, data shows
news.summary: Data observed across 66 corridors in Africa shows conversion costs from 1.5% to 19% in January, with competition driving pricing gaps.

news.title: Lombard looks to link institutional custody to onchain finance
news.titleOriginal: Lombard looks to link institutional custody to onchain finance

news.title: Why blockchain TPS numbers often collapse in the real world
news.titleOriginal: Why blockchain TPS numbers often collapse in the real world
news.summary: High TPS figures promise scale, but every additional transaction increases the burden on the very nodes meant to keep networks decentralized.

news.title: XRP analysts explain why price drop below $1 ‘remains possible’
news.titleOriginal: XRP analysts explain why price drop below $1 ‘remains possible’
news.summary: XRP looked increasingly bearish at $1.40, with a key indicator suggesting that a downward move below $1 was possible in the coming weeks.
